title: Ireland Baldwin is a bloodied up mess in a dress as she channels Carrie for Halloween costume
text:
Take Ireland Baldwin to the prom. I dare you!

The 24-year-old model dressed up in a costume inspired by the 1976 horror classic Carrie on Tuesday while out and about in Los Angeles.

No doubt she was getting ready to hit up a Halloween party as she was covered up in faux blood.

In the spirit: Ireland Baldwin dressed up in a costume inspired by the 1976 horror classic Carrie on Tuesday while out and about in Los Angeles

Classic: Sissy Spacek in the 1976 film Carrie

She donned a white long-sleeved mini dress along with strappy black heels.

Her make-up was fully done including a swipe of shiny pink lip as she had two bloody streaks running down from her eyes.

Ireland's brunette tresses were put in a bun as she walked along with her cell phone in hand.

Out and about: No doubt the 24-year-old model was getting ready to hit up a Halloween party as she was covered up in faux blood

Wow factor: She donned a white long-sleeved mini dress along with strappy black heels

The model also covered up some of her many - 24 to be exact - tattoos that she has covering her body.

Her left arm carries a majority of the tattoos with numerous small designs tatted around her entire arm.

She also has a large red lotus flower along her waist.

The blonde bombshell recently made headlines last month when she went on The Comedy Central Roast of Alec Baldwin.

Interesting: Her make-up was fully done including a swipe of shiny pink lip as she had two bloody streaks running down from her eyes

'Dad, I'm Ireland. I almost didn't even know about it, because I haven't checked my voicemails for the last 12 years,' she said in her opening line as a nod toward their infamous feud back when she was 11.

When Alec was going through a divorce with Ireland's mother Kim Basinger it got kind of ugly. During that time, Ireland missed a phone call she was supposed to have with her famous father which led him to leave a voicemail calling her a 'rude, thoughtless, little pig.'
description: The 24-year-old model dressed up in a costume inspired by the 1976 horror classic Carrie on Tuesday while out and about in Los Angeles.
